data.name: Anime Gas Station 18+ DLC
data.detailed_description: The DLC contains adult content that unlocks all of the content in the base game.
data.about_the_game: The DLC contains adult content that unlocks all of the content in the base game.
data.short_description: The DLC contains adult content that unlocks all of the content in the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
